oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Return of Co. F, 154th (Senior) Tenn. Vol. Inf. Regt. CSA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This former militia regiment mustered in at Paris, Tenn. on April 25, 1861. Because it existed prior to secession, this militia unit kept its former number and added to it the "Senior" designation indicating that it antedated regiments with lower numbers. Donor's ancestor is Cpl. D. D. Brisendine.
